Hi,

I'm facing 2 problems using a datagrid with cell validation:

1- When i have an invalid field the cell stays in edition not allowing me to do edit new cells.

I would like to have the possibility for the user to edit other cells(I prefer this solution), or to block the user from leaving the cell until he corrects the problem.

2- I saw that the Esc Key (CancelEdit), removes the red border validation out of the cell allowing me to edit other cells, but i I would like to keep the red border since an error is still there. Do you know how to do it?

Can anyone help?

Thanks

Joao
